name: Knife Up Challenge
description:
Prepare for a new Challenge. knife and flip, hit it. A tap game idle style with tapping. Hit everything you can to beat all levels. Get points and all the strawberries you can, go to stage stores and Free up, knife dash. legendary knives you will find.
In this idle flipper, the boss is you. Many weapons to unlock, flipping knive to get them. vlm
Unlock all hidden levels, kni and you will unlock the challenges section. force is not everything, the power is in the strategy vlm. fun dash Guaranteed . enjoy like a baseball boy.

** Features**

- Get the, perfect tower. Unlock the, throwing knife. throw it and up up up
- Test all the elements dificult all the balls. Stab, Break them and get strawberries, points and place yourself at the top rankings with the aid, knife edge.
- Enjoy with the welcome gifts and various mysterious, aa knife.

An endless game with easy handling. Help yourself with tapp mode and knife fingers. aa knife
Any questions let us know in the comments. We will be happy to receive all your concerns to improve.
